html:
Egyptians shall know the Lord in that day. The Egyptians will have true knowledge concerning Jehovah.

shall do sacrifice and oblation; yea, they shall vow a vow unto the Lord. Sacrifices, oblations, and vows pertain to temple worship and also to Sabbath worship (D&C 59:9-12). That the Egyptians will make sacrifices to Jehovah indicates the presence of a temple dedicated to Jehovah in Egypt.
